ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok!!  *grin*  here is an Idea, that Im SURE Varant will aggree with to let us get bind.... ready...:) It wont require a reagent.  It wont even require a spell.
ygData.messageBody:
Ok!! *grin* here is an Idea, that Im SURE Varant will aggree with to let
us get bind.... ready...:)

It wont require a reagent. It wont even require a spell. Here is what you
do.

1st. Sing the magic /auction song. You have to word it just right though.
The most successful version that I have used is as follows.....

/auction Will pay 2 Platnum for bind to first one to /tell me!!!

You will then have to click on your Persona screen. Select 2 platnum and
give it to another player. Casting time on this will be about 2-3 minutes.
( I have never waited longer than 10 minutes ). With the time you save you
can get into battle quicker and make up the lost loot.

I do think that Verant will not approve this though:( It is just to easy :)

Dripping and Ooooozing with Sarcasm

Sevin Tercet <Mischief>
22nd Human Bard
on Brell

-----Original Message-----
From: chlebek@... [mailto:chlebek@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 12:16 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


From: chlebek@...




> Its an interesting idea. And dont make assumptions for everyone else on
the
> list, they mayt not be sick of it.

Let's take a vote...


Me? I'm sick of it. We are hybrids. Verant has stated again and again
hybrids
will not get bind. Therefore WE will not get bind.

Taelin
